overview: Soldier of fortune Maxton is stranded in a Central American country. He and Tom, the nephew of the country's richest man, try to end Morloff's banditry but just barely escape a firing squad. They become rivals for Rosita.
tagline: He's a Darling! He's a Lovable Wow! He's a Devil! And he hasn't forgotten a single trick from "Cock-eyed World."
title: A Devil with Women
